markdown.markdown:
Hi, I'm Karan

Data Science master's student in Bristol, building practical, real-world projects in analytics, automation, and AI.

I'm currently studying Data Science at UWE Bristol and focusing on turning ideas into working, useful tools. I like taking messy, unstructured problems and breaking them down into something clean, logical, and repeatable. A lot of what I build starts from a simple question: “Can I make this easier or smarter?”

Right now I'm exploring a mix of automation, data analysis, and applied machine learning. I'm especially interested in domains where small, well-designed tools can have a big impact—things like finance, medical imaging, and workflow optimisation. I care about structure, clarity, and making things that other people can actually use.

Skills

Python
Pandas & Data Analysis
Machine Learning (scikit-learn)
Automation Scripts & Tools
SQL & Databases
Documentation & Clean Structure

What I'm working on

  • Python File Organizer – a small but useful tool to clean and structure messy folders.
  • Finance / Quant exploration – experimenting with signals, features, and simple models.
  • Medical AI ideas – looking into how imaging data can be used in practical ways.

I'm still early in my journey, but I'm building things step by step and trying to keep everything as clear, reproducible, and honest as possible. This site will grow as I add more projects and refine the ones I already have.

Connect with me

If you want to see what I'm working on or just get a sense of how I think about projects, you can find me here:

  • GitHub: github.com/knhf
  • LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/karen-homayounfar-96824893
